3.126.
Guarantees of creditors' rights 
1. Creditors of one or both spouses have the right to intervene as third parties with independent claims in proceedings concerning the division of the matrimonial property. 
2. The spouse bringing an action for the division of the property must identify in the statement of claim the joint creditors of the spouses or of one of them known to him or her, and must notify them of the institution of the proceedings by sending them a copy of the statement of claim.
